SELECT
GALLERY_IDX, GALLERY_TITLE, GALLERY_WRITER, GALLERY_WRITER_IDX, GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX, (SELECT SCHOOL_NAME FROM school_info WHERE SCHOOL_IDX = GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX) as GALLERY_SCHOOL_NAME, (SELECT AREA_NAME FROM area_info WHERE area_idx = (SELECT SCHOOL_AREA FROM school_info WHERE SCHOOL_IDX = GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX)) as GALLERY_SCHOOL_AREA, GALLERY_COMMENT, (SELECT IMG_STR_NAME FROM img_file as A WHERE A.GALLERY_IDX = B.GALLERY_IDX LIMIT 1) as IMG_STR_NAME, GALLERY_INSERT_DATE FROM gallery_board as B WHERE GALLERY_DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT AAA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gallery_board C WHERE C.GALLERY_DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS TOTAL_COUNT, AA.* FROM( SELECT ABS(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) AS GALLERY_COUNT, GALLERY_IDX, GALLERY_TITLE, GALLERY_WRITER, GALLERY_WRITER_IDX, GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX, (SELECT SCHOOL_NAME FROM school_info WHERE SCHOOL_IDX = GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX) as GALLERY_SCHOOL_NAME, (SELECT AREA_NAME FROM area_info WHERE area_idx = (SELECT SCHOOL_AREA FROM school_info WHERE SCHOOL_IDX = GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX)) as GALLERY_SCHOOL_AREA, GALLERY_COMMENT, (SELECT IMG_STR_NAME FROM img_file as A WHERE A.GALLERY_IDX = B.GALLERY_IDX LIMIT 1) as IMG_STR_NAME, GALLERY_INSERT_DATE FROM gallery_board as B , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) ROWNUM WHERE GALLERY_DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AA ) AAA limit #{START}, #{END};
SELECT SCHOOL_IDX, SCHOOL_NAME FROM school_info WHERE SCHOOL_AREA = #{area_idx}
SELECT GALLERY_IDX, GALLERY_TITLE, GALLERY_WRITER, GALLERY_COMMENT, GALLERY_INSERT_DATE, GALLERY_CLICK_COUNT FROM gallery_board WHERE GALLERY_DELETE_AT = 'N' AND GALLERY_IDX = #{gallery_idx}
SELECT IMG_IDX, IMG_STR_NAME FROM img_file WHERE GALLERY_IDX = #{gallery_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery_board ( GALLERY_TITLE, GALLERY_WRITER, GALLERY_WRITER_IDX, GALLERY_SCHOOL_IDX, GALLERY_COMMENT, GALLERY_DELETE_AT, GALLERY_INSERT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{gallery_title}, #{writer_name}, #{writer_idx}, #{gallery_school}, #{gallery_comment}, 'N', date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') )

INSERT INTO img_file ( GALLERY_IDX, IMG_ORG_NAME, IMG_STR_NAME, IMG_FILE_SIZE, IMG_DELETE_AT, IMG_INSERT_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT max(gallery_idx) FROM gallery_board), #{IMG_ORG_NAME}, #{IMG_STR_NAME}, #{IMG_FILE_SIZE}, 'N', date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') )
mapper.update: UPDATE gallery_board SET GALLERY_TITLE = #{gallery_title}, GALLERY_COMMENT = #{gallery_comment}, GALLERY_UPDATE_DATE = date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') WHERE GALLERY_IDX = #{gallery_idx}
UPDATE gallery_board SET GALLERY_DELETE_AT = 'Y' WHERE GALLERY_IDX = #{gallery_idx}
UPDATE gallery_board SET GALLERY_CLICK_COUNT = GALLERY_CLICK_COUNT + 1 WHERE GALLERY_IDX = #{gallery_idx}
